sections.installation:
1. Upload the src(pkrss) folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the plugin configuration screen under WordPress Admin > Settings > PKRSS and set your preferences
  4. Create posts using the easy to use shortcode and watch the magic happen
